you_are_eligible_to_download_the_app: You are eligible to download the BIA-RADAR app!
dismiss_download_message_1: For the best experience we recommend downloading the BIA-RADAR app.
dismiss_download_message_2: You can dismiss this message and continue using the web application, but some features may be limited. But don't worry, you can download the app at any time by clicking the 'Download App' button in the menu.
video_guide_subtitle: Learn how to use your BIA-RADAR
use_this_button_to_emit_a_sound: Use this button to emit a sound signal and locate your BIA-RADAR
bia_utilizes_this_info_to_better_underst: BIA utilizes this info to better understand your surroundings and provide accurate feedback.
learn_to_use: Learn how to use your BIA-RADAR
guides_info: All videos are optimized to be short and straight to the point, ensuring a quick and efficient learning experience.
